content:
From: Gergely Buday <gbuday@karolyrobert.hu>
Hi,

what is the standard way of feature requests on Isabelle/jEdit?

I don't know if this is possible with some setting:

when editing a bibfile, Sidekick shows the bibitem key, which is not very readable if you import it from a database like DBLP.

Could it be that Sidekick would display the title of the work? That would make the list readable and useful.

  • Gergely

From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
The same key shows up in a document, as argument to @{cite}
antiquotation, where it is equally unreadable.

The problem is in the database entry.

I routinely put bibtex sources into a readable form, before importing
them into my documents. I also clean up the content.

Makarius
